predicate.note: Frames file for 'jog' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 51.3.2, Framenet entry Self motion.

roleset.name: run slowly

example.name: intransitive
example.text: A couple in fashionable spandex warm-up suits jogs by, headphones jauntily in place, [*-2] weaving their way along a street of fractured and fallen houses.
example.arg: A couple in fashionable spandex warm-up suits
[*-2] weaving their way along a street of fractured and fallen houses

roleset.note: There's also a usage "jog one's memory" that I'm avoiding for the time being.
